caption.p: Hypotheses for the creation of a strategy to prevent the invasion of Xcc in the Mediterranean Basin (∗).

tr.td: Maintenance of the “status quo”: the system self-manages, pending a complaint about the presence of Xcc in the Mediterranean Basin.
Adoption of voluntary certification, by means of a protocol made public and approved by institutional bodies (research and phytosanitary certification) which includes a quarantine process.
Forecasting of a tax - fixed or variable - for a commercialized product, in order to self-finance the system of prevention and sensitize consumers.
